description: This file implements a recommendations service for a music streaming backend API. It provides functions to generate personalized track recommendations based on user listening history and overall popular tracks, utilizing caching to optimize performance. The code interacts with a database via SQLAlchemy ORM models and includes logic for cache validation, seed selection, and recommendation blending.

methods.name: _is_cache_fresh
methods.description: Checks if the cache is still valid based on its timestamp and TTL.

methods.name: _fetch_recent_user_preferences
methods.description: Analyzes recent playback history to derive top artist IDs and genres for a user.

methods.name: _fetch_popular_tracks
methods.description: Fetches globally popular tracks based on playback counts.

methods.name: _fetch_seeded_tracks
methods.description: Retrieves tracks matching user seed preferences, prioritizing by artist or genre.

methods.name: _filter_existing_tracks
methods.description: Filters a list of track IDs to include only those existing in the database.

methods.name: compute_recommendations
methods.description: Main function to compute or retrieve cached personalized track recommendations for a user, blending seed-based and popular tracks, with cache management.
